summary:
The American Revolutionary War (1775â€“1783) was a fight for independence from Great Britain. American Patriots, led by George Washington, formed the Continental Army. They defeated the British Army in battles like Lexington and Concord. The war began due to tensions over taxes and laws imposed by Britain.

After winning key battles, America gained allies like France and Spain. The war ended with the Treaty of Paris in 1783, where Britain recognized the United States as an independent country. This marked the birth of a new nation.
title: American Revolutionary War
